cs.ualberta.conditionlog.controller
Class PasswordManager

java.lang.Object
  cs.ualberta.conditionlog.controller.PasswordManager

public class PasswordManager
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods for checking whether a password has been specified, creating a password, and testing whether a password is valid.

Author:
tgriffit

checkIfPasswordSet

public boolean checkIfPasswordSet()
Checks whether or not a password has been saved in the database

Returns:
true if a password has been specified or false if not

Tests whether or not a password is valid.

Parameters:
pass -
Returns:
true if the password is correct or false if it isn't

public void setPassword(java.lang.String pass)
Saves a hashed password in the database.

Parameters:
pass -

resetPassword

public void resetPassword()
Removes the password from the database. Any photos encrypted with the old password will become unreadable, so use this carefully. Included for testing purposes.

getHashForTesting

public java.lang.String getHashForTesting()
Finds the actual hash stored in the database. Used during testing so that the old password can be backed up.

Returns:

setHashAfterTesting

public void setHashAfterTesting(java.lang.String hash)
Used to restore the old password hash after testing without knowing the plaintext for the password.

Parameters:
